page.title: 17Dinas School-Our Dinner Lady
page.content: {Mrs.Watts}comes to school at 11 o'clock.At 12 o'clock she lays the tables.She tells us when it is dinner time.We line up and wash and dry our hands.Mrs.Watts gives us paper towels.When we are having dinner she looks after us.After dinner,if it is nice,she takes us into the playing field.She tells us when to go back to school.When it is raining we stay in the hall and Mrs.Watts plays acting games with us. She also collects the dinner money on Monday morning. Mrs.Watts wears a pink and white checked overall and a little, white, nylon cap .
